models)
 -  Gonzaluigi  Karaoke  fusion  models  (standard |  aggresive |  yaml)  -  also  confuses  BV/LV  more    -  MVSep  MelBand  Karaoke  (lead/back  vocals)  SCNet  XL  IHF  by  becruily  (SDR:  9.53)  Worse  SDR  than  the  top  performing  Roformers,  but  works  best  in  busy  mix  scenarios,  and  
when
 
Mel-Roformer
 
models
 
fail,
 
generally
 
bleedier
 
arch.

fix
 
the
 
bleed
 
in
 
the
 
back-instrum

first”,

noticed

pattern

if

  -  (x-minus/uvronline)  Lead  and  Backing  vocal  separator  (in  “Extract  Backing  
vocals>Mel-Roformer
 
Lead/Back)

the
 
additional
